title: Issues adding RP/Mystery Skin Event??
body:
So when do we get our free skins from the mystery gift event?

Ive purchased 17 Of the mystery boxes and wondering when do i get the skins?

Also im having a problem adding RP to my account, it tells me i have to wait 24 hours and wait but that was about 4 days ago. ty

replies.body:
Gifts should be distributed this week, hopefully before the end of the week as per the FAQ on the promotions page: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/mystery-skins-return

For your RP issue, you'll need to write into support.  We can't help with those types of issues on the boards.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
